backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled family membership and a family-only chat with message posting and pagination.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-like summary list describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme tokens with a custom OKLCH color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, links the PWA manifest and icons, and loads the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, appearance, colors, start URL, and icons for installability.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing caching for static assets, network-first for API calls, and offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component applying theming, authentication gating, service worker registration, and rendering the new app placeholder.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI component showing an access denied alert with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks admin status and blocks access with an error screen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper that shows loading, sign-in UI, or the app depending on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flows with loading and error states.
Provides the main layout with header, footer, and identity-aware UI elements such as login and install buttons.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallEntry: Displays install options for the PWA, showing either an install button or a help dialog depending on platform support.
frontend/src/features/auth/hooks/useAdmi: Checks whether the current actor is an admin using react-query and returns admin status and loading state.
frontend/src/features/auth/hooks/useMemb: Fetches membership status for the current user and exposes member flag, loading state, and fetch status.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatPage.tsx: Renders the chat UI with membership gating, message list, auto-scrolling, and message sending functionality.
frontend/src/features/chat/hooks/useChat: Fetches chat messages from the backend with polling and exposes messages, loading state, and refetch function.
frontend/src/features/chat/hooks/usePost: Provides a mutation for posting messages, including validation, success handling, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/newApp/NewAppPlace: A placeholder page allowing users to describe their app idea and shows a confirmation when captured.
frontend/src/features/settings/FamilySet: UI for managing family members, including listing, adding, removing members, and validating principal inputs.
frontend/src/features/settings/hooks/use: Manages family member list queries and mutations for adding/removing members with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, handling initialization and dependent query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base imports and theme variables for light and dark color schemes with custom OKLCH palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker in production, handles updates, and logs registration status.
frontend/src/pwa/useInstallPrompt.ts: React hook that captures and exposes the PWA install prompt, tracking installability and installation state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended components, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, existing features, and pending new app creation request.
